name: Boss Gauntlet
description:
GOAL: Master new abilities and conquer the gauntlet of bosses sent your way. Earn new upgrades with each victory and test your skill against successively more difficult randomized bosses.

NOTE/REALITY: Prototype contains 1 boss and several upgrades.

Members:
Daniel Kim [BloodyCrown]
Merrick Tay [FlyingFactory]
